title: Find Ratios of Consecutive Terms
text: To determine if a sequence is geometric, we find the ratio of the consecutive terms shown.

title: Ratio Between -2 and 6
text: What is the common ratio between -2 and 6? Effectively, what is $$\frac{6}{-2}$$?

title: Ratio Between 6 and -12
text: What is the common ratio between 6 and -12? Effectively, what is $$\frac{-12}{6}$$?

title: Ratio Between -12 and 36
text: What is the common ratio between 36 and -12? Effectively, what is $$\frac{36}{-12}$$?

title: Ratio Between -72 and 36
text: What is the common ratio between 36 and -72? Effectively, what is $$\frac{-72}{36}$$?

title: Ratio Between 216 and -72
text: What is the common ratio between -72 and 216? Effectively, what is $$\frac{216}{-72}$$?

hintAnswer: No, the series is not geometric.
title: Determining Commonality in Ratios
text: Are the ratios between consecutive terms common?
choices: Yes, the series is geometric. The common ratio is $$r=2$$.
Yes, the series is geometric. The common ratio is $$r=4$$.
Yes, the series is geometric. The common ratio is $$r=\frac{1}{3}$$.
No, the series is not geometric.
